lines.line: Every morning used to start with cuddles and warmth.
Now I spend my days watching the world go by.
Sometimes I try to play, but it's not the same without her.
I remember how she taught me to pounce.
The empty space beside me feels so cold now.
I hide away sometimes, hoping she'll come find me.
They say time heals all wounds, but some days the tears still come.

parsed_script.full_script: Every morning used to start with cuddles and warmth.  But one day, everything changed.  Now I spend my days watching the world go by.  Sometimes I try to play, but it's not the same without her.  I remember how she taught me to pounce.  The empty space beside me feels so cold now.  I hide away sometimes, hoping she'll come find me.  They say time heals all wounds, but some days the tears still come.
